overview: Shamsudin (Imuda) is an artist who retreats to a village to find some inspiration to draw. After a few days there, Shamsudin start to encounter mysterious incident revolving Mak Jah, an old woman whom he befriend at the village. Strange things start to happen when someone told Shamsudin that Mak Jah was actually dead a few years ago.
tagline: Let Your Eyes Be The Witness
title: Sumpahan Puaka
